description.p: Extract the day name from a date or datetime value.
Returns the day name from a date or datetime value.

discussion.p: The DayName function extracts the day name from a date or datetime value.

example.caption: DayName() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 CurrentDateTime() AS Now, DayName(CurrentDateTime()) AS Expr1 FROM Orders =10/10/2019 12:48:35 00 pm|Thursday
